casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sammy C. PERKINS. No. 60A94-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2004. Edwin L. West, III, Wilmington, for Sammy Perkins. Steven Arbogast, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2004 by Defendant to Stay His 8 October 2004 Execution Date to Provide the Court an Adequate Opportunity to Review Defendant's Petition:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2004."
